messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Thanks Lynda,
messages.msgSnippet: Let me know when you plan your vacation and I ll go through my list of fun free things to do between here and Portland!  With kidlets, my most favorite things
messages.messageBody:
Let me know when you plan your vacation and I'll go through my list of fun
free things to do between here and Portland! With kidlets, my most favorite
things have become the free ones <g>

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
From: <ddzimlew@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 03, 2001 10:11 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Thanks Lynda,


> Lynda,
> I've had a chance to look into some of the sign language videos you told
> me about and they seem very promising. I really appreciate that you
> took the time to help me out.
> (Tami too! I love your idea about tagging things around the house! )
> You made me homesick for the coast. I used to live in Oregon, not on the
> beach but close enough to hitchhike ( I was young and foolish, not
> recommending hitchhiking to anyone ) there after work and on weekends.
> Must plan a vacation!
> Thanks again,
> Deb L
>

messages.subject: Thanks Lynda,
messages.msgSnippet: Lynda, I ve had a chance to look into some of the sign language videos you told me about and they seem very promising.  I really appreciate  that you took the
messages.messageBody:
Lynda,
I've had a chance to look into some of the sign language videos you told
me about and they seem very promising. I really appreciate that you
took the time to help me out.
(Tami too! I love your idea about tagging things around the house! )
You made me homesick for the coast. I used to live in Oregon, not on the
beach but close enough to hitchhike ( I was young and foolish, not
recommending hitchhiking to anyone ) there after work and on weekends.
Must plan a vacation!
Thanks again,
Deb L
